it.gdapplicazioni.easy.gui

Class FileSaver

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JFileChooser
            • it.gdapplicazioni.easy.gui.FileSaver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class FileSaver
extends javax.swing.JFileChooser
    CLASS FOR INSTANTIATION AND MANAGEMENT OF FILE SAVE OBJECT
    - Supports saving in .txt file (new or existing)
    - Supports saving in .csv file (new or existing)
    - Supports screenshot components or whole frame in image files
    - Supports image capture from the web and saving to file
    - Supports serialization of objects in .dat files
    Version:
    1.0.0.2
    Author:
    GD Applicazioni
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        METHOD FOR SAVING IN .txt FILE
        - Any separators included in the text
        Parameters:
        text - Text to be saved to file
        append - Add or overwrite mode (true = add)
        existingFileAlertMessage - Message for existing file warning
        existingFileAlertTitle - Title for existing file warning
